strapiPost.title: Holiday Classics Shows Across NWA
strapiPost.content:
Speaking of shows, we have a few more shows for you to knock off your holiday checklist...

  • Naughty and nice: The Victory Theatre in Rogers is putting on a live show of The Best Christmas Pageant Ever the next few weeks. Additionally, The Polar Express movie will be showing at the Victory Theatre for a one day event this Saturday, Dec. 11.
  • Concert series: Down in Fayetteville this weekend at the Walton Arts Center you can see SoNA in action for their Christmas concert, as well as a family friendly performance of The Snowman: A Family Concert.
